Lyric:
[00:11.23]I pulled into Nazareth, I was feelin' about half past dead;

[00:17.75]I just need some place where I can lay my head.

[00:24.38]"Hey, mister, can you tell me where a man might find a bed?"

[00:31.15]He just grinned and shook my hand, and "No!", was all he said.

[00:37.62]Take a load off Fannie, take a load for free;

[00:44.50]Take a load off Fannie, And (and) (and) you can put the load right on me.

[01:00.30]I picked up my bag, I went lookin' for a place to hide;

[01:07.02]When I saw Carmen and the Devil walkin' side by side.

[01:13.97]I said, "Hey, Carmen, come on, let's go downtown."

[01:20.28]She said, "I gotta go, but m'friend can stick around."

[01:26.99]Take a load off Fannie, take a load for free;

[01:33.38]Take a load off Fannie, And (and) (and) you can put the load right on me.

[01:50.00]Go down, Miss Moses, there's nothin' you can say

[01:56.54]It's just ol' Luke, and Luke's waitin' on the Judgement Day.

[02:02.93]"Well, Luke, my friend, what about young Anna Lee?"

[02:09.68]He said, "Do me a favor, son, woncha stay an' keep Anna Lee company?"

[02:16.29]Take a load off Fannie, take a load for free;

[02:24.85]Take a load off Fannie, And (and) (and) you can put the load right on me.

[02:38.99]Crazy Chester followed me, and he caught me in the fog.

[02:45.68]He said, "I will fix your rags, if you'll take Jack, my dog."

[02:52.00]I said, "Wait a minute, Chester, you know I'm a peaceful man."

[02:59.00]He said, "That's okay, boy, won't you feed him when you can."

[03:05.82]Take a load off Fannie, take a load for free;

[03:12.04]Take a load off Fannie, And (and) (and) you can put the load right on me.

[03:35.72]Catch a Cannonball, now, t'take me down the line

[03:41.70]My bag is sinkin' low and I do believe it's time.

[03:48.37]To get back to Miss Annie, you know she's the only one.

[03:55.24]Who sent me here with her regards for everyone.

[04:01.59]Take a load off Fannie, take a load for free;

[04:08.16]Take a load off Fannie, And (and) (and) you can put the load right on me.
